name: mm::heap::slab::SlabMeta::<SLOT_SIZE>::alloc

mm::heap::slot_list::SlabSlotList::<SLOT.doc:
Pops a slot from the front of the list.

 It returns `None` if the list is empty.

log::max_level.doc:
Returns the current maximum log level.

 The [`log!`], [`error!`], [`warn!`], [`info!`], [`debug!`], and [`trace!`] macros check
 this value and discard any message logged at a higher level. The maximum
 log level is set by the [`set_max_level`] function.

 [`log!`]: macro.log.html
 [`error!`]: macro.error.html
 [`warn!`]: macro.warn.html
 [`info!`]: macro.info.html
 [`debug!`]: macro.debug.html
 [`trace!`]: macro.trace.html
 [`set_max_level`]: fn.set_max_level.html

core::fmt::Arguments::<'a>::from_str.doc:
Create a `fmt::Arguments` object for a single static string.

 Formatting this `fmt::Arguments` will just produce the string as-is.
